attributes.action: Reduce fuel tax so students and the disadvantaged can learn to drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently many students find themselves having to hand over fist for driving lessons simply because fuel tax forces driving instructors to charge so much. Many other people in society must face the same problems, were it now costs over a grand to achieve a driving license, even before having to pay for a car and all the other necessary attachements.
